title: Japan's Crazy Robot Restaurant - Gregway
description:
There's a Robot Restaurant in Shinjuku, but it should really be called a "women in bikinis surrounded by men in robot suits" restaurant. 

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody? Welcome to a Gregway. So I went to Japan the other day, just popped over for the hell of it, and people keep asking me now that I'm back what's the coolest, craziest, Most Japanese thing I went and did and or saw? And the answer of course is the Robot Restaurant in Shinjuku. Now you go down there and of course Shinjuku in general, very gaudy, lots of neon lights, lots of alleyways, stuff like that. But you got to this Robot Restaurant and you immediately knew you were in a different different atmosphere and that's just walking in. That's before the show even happens, just neon light and if you were epileptic you were going down, there was no doubt about it. Something was going to catch the side of your eye and you're going up. But then you get down there and like you know they gave you this bento box and it's this giant like basically runway with like seats on one side, seats on the other and I'm me and Christine are front row on our on our seat thing and then you know they kill the
